text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On my way back to the academy after<n>a shopping trip, I see
a Tracen student<n>in front of me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Phew... Okay, break time's over.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I need to hurry back... and move on to<n>the next training
exercise.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You can do this, Rice! Believe in<n>yourself... Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower runs with a strong spring<n>to her step. The aura
she possesses<n>in spite of her small build piques my<n>
curiosity.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Entranced by her running form, I<n>continue following her
down the road<n>towards the academy.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She gets stopped by a red light...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sigh.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And another red light...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ahhh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
How many red lights is this now?!<n>Today is definitely not
her lucky day...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We end up waiting at every single<n>crosswalk, so by the time
we finally<n>arrive at Tracen Academy, the sun<n>has already
long set.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: No big deal. I wasn't in a rush or<n>anythi—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Um... I-I'm so sorry!
choice_data_list: Huh? Are you talking to me?
Huh? Are you talking to me?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Th-that's right. Um... I'm r-really...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm really sorry!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I mean... It only took you this long to<n>come back to the
academy because I<n>was running next to you the whole<n>
time...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm so, so sorry!
choice_data_list: Don't sweat it, it wasn't y—
Don't sweat it, it wasn't y—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
No, it was clearly my fault. I'm a<n>hopeless girl who only
brings<n>misfortune upon everyone...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
So let me apologize... D-don't worry!<n>If I leave, everything
will be fine!<n>Goodbye!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower dashes off without<n>giving me a chance to stop
her... I feel<n>bad for making her worry so much<n>about me.
choice_data_list:
(I need to go tell her she was just overthinking
things!)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I head off in the same direction as<n>Rice Shower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant... Sigh.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...Uuugh. I wonder if the person just<n>now was okay being
this late.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
What if they were really, really<n>hungry... Or what if they
missed the<n>newest episode of their favorite TV<n>show...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Why am I always like this?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seems like she worries an awful lot<n>about other people.
Perhaps she just<n>needs some encourageme—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Nuh-uh, I have to try even harder!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I already made up my mind to enter<n>the upcoming tryouts.
I'll actually<n>enter, actually run, and then...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'll make my debut and win a bunch<n>of races. Then, I won't
be a burden<n>anymore!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Mhm... And that means more training!<n>Rice, you can do this!
Believe in<n>yourself...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She suddenly starts training with such<n>intense fervor that I
can't bring myself<n>to interrupt her. Ultimately, I miss my<n>
chance to talk to her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower... I'm looking forward to<n>seeing her run at the
upcoming<n>tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Finally, it's the day of the tryouts. The<n>venue is filled to the
brim with trainers<n>looking to scout talented runners.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Suddenly—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Rice! Ricety-rice-rice! Wherefore art<n>thou, Riiiiice?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As class rep, it's my duty to inform<n>you that your race is
about to begin!

text_block_list.name: Tryouts Official A
text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O, isn't your race<n>the one after? Make
sure you don't<n>miss your race either!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wha?!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
So Rice Shower is boycotting even the<n>tryouts now? She
has talent, but it's<n>all going to waste.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She can have all the talent in the<n>world, but if she doesn't
want to race,<n>then that's that.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The tryouts reach their conclusion, but<n>Rice Shower is
nowhere to be found.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Later that night, I spot her out of the<n>corner of my eye.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hic... Waaa—waaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm such a dumb dummy! I even said<n>I was going to try my
very, very best...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sniffle... Why... Why am I soworthless?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't just stand by and watch her<n>cry like this, so I walk
up and call out<n>to her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-you're... from the other day?
